articles.title: ASEAN excludes Myanmar junta leader from summit in rare move - Reuters
articles.description: Southeast Asian countries will invite a non-political representative from Myanmar to a regional summit this month, delivering an unprecedented snub to the military leader who led a coup against an elected civilian government in February.
